# Car of the Future
Discover Magna innovations designed for the car of the future
## We are driven by the vision of creating a future where mobility is accessible, sustainable, and inclusive.
Our goal is a software- and systems-defined vehicle equipped with active safety features and connected capabilities, while embracing advancements in electrification.
The car of the future will be embedded with Magna innovations designed to enhance safety, intelligence, and sustainability. Our full systems approach and deep product expertise allows us to understand the complete picture and deliver solutions that respond to evolving market opportunities.
[Stay connected](#contact)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/coupa_electronics/landing_page_banner-01.jpg?sfvrsn=3d66f0b0_3)
## Paving the way to advanced mobility
Magna's L2 and L2+ advanced systems are engineered to support OEMs in addressing key industry demands around safety, user experience and regulatory alignment
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/electrical-electronics/adas-automated-driving/l2l2plus-systems)
## Other products for the car of the future
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/innovation-header-car-of-the-future.jpg?sfvrsn=d114e5dd_1)
### ClearView™ Vision System
Designed to make vehicles smarter and safer, ClearView™ enhances visibility by providing an unobstructed rear view from camera’s integrated into the exterior of the vehicle.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/exterior-interior/mirrors/clearview)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/innovation-tile-thermal-camera.jpg?sfvrsn=d2c37fac_1)
### Thermal Camera
Magna’s world-leading thermal sensing systems detect pedestrians and animals, and help drivers see up to four times the headlight range.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/electrical-electronics/adas-automated-driving/thermal-sensing)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/79d2b1f958122e5c8c85ded97ce1c6ef.jpg?sfvrsn=602fa8fd_1)
### B-Pillarless
The SmartAccess™ B-Pillarless power door system provides a holistic approach to vehicle structure and design – enabling seamless ingress and egress for enhanced comfort and convenience.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/b613da6411f9594761ae561c418367f3.jpg?sfvrsn=ab1785b_1)
### Mirror integrated DMS/OMS
In an increasingly distracted society, Magna has developed a future-ready, smart solution that alerts a driver to danger without adding to distraction.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/exterior-interior/mirrors/driver-monitoring-system)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/smartaccess/power_door-01.jpeg?sfvrsn=d4f3e043_4&size=440)### Magna's SmartAccess Power Door System Hits the Market in Style
[Read story](https://www.magna.com/stories/news-press-release/2023/magna's-smartaccess-power-door-system-hits-the-market-in-style)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/stories/2024-news-releases/magna-reconfigurable-seating-01.jpg?sfvrsn=772a194a_5&size=440)### Magna Awarded Reconfigurable Seating Business with Chinese OEM
[Read story](https://www.magna.com/stories/news-press-release/2024/magna-awarded-reconfigurable-seating-business-with-chinese-oem)

# Mirrors
![Company Landing Page](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/actuators/mirrors---overhead-consoles-page-banner-bmw-x4m-osm-carbon-fiber-01.jpg?sfvrsn=57876521_2)
## Prime Real Estate for Feature Integration
Electronics have enabled mirrors to transform into vision systems which offer increased safety features and allow for unique styling. Magna is a leading full system supplier for innovative vision systems to the global automotive industry.
## Interior Mirrors
Synergy Between Glass and Electronics
Magna is a global leader in providing high-tech interior mirrors that improve both the safety and overall aesthetics of the vehicle. Interior mirrors are not just a piece of glass, but are prime real estate for electronics integration.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/clearview-ism-01.jpg?sfvrsn=9c8f2b67_2)
### ClearView™
The ClearView™ inside mirror switches between a traditional reflective surface and a full-size display showing an unobstructed view from the rear-mounted camera. A larger field of view, dynamic overlays, and improved low light visibility are only some of the benefits of ClearView™.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/exterior-interior/mirrors/clearview)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/dms-1bweb4.webp?sfvrsn=2594d02b_1)
### Mirror Integrated Driver & Occupant Monitoring System
Proven camera based solution that actively monitors, predicts and reduces distracted driving through customizable alerts and notifications. The system also features in-cabin detection for enhanced safety.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/exterior-interior/mirrors/driver-monitoring-system)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/memory_inside_mirror/memory_inside_mirror-01.jpg?sfvrsn=2ecc22f1_3)
### Memory Inside Mirror
The Memory Inside Mirror integrates a memory actuator for personalized, quiet adjustment—seamlessly extending the vehicle’s memory features to the interior mirror.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/exterior-interior/mirrors/memory-inside-mirror)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/prismatic-01.jpg?sfvrsn=4553f22_2)
### Prismatic
Standard prismatic mirrors allow the driver to see behind the vehicle while giving the option to reduce glare by changing the angle of the mirror prism inside.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/vison-systems/mirror-interior-unretouched.jpg?sfvrsn=57cdb01_0)
### Auto Dimming
Electrochromic (EC) mirrors improve safety by reducing glare in the inside mirror. When integrated sensors detect glare they automatically dim the inside mirror to reduce driver discomfort.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/infinity-touch-01.jpg?sfvrsn=5e5777bd_2)
### Infinity™ Mirror
The PACE award-winning Infinity™ mirror has a polished edge that radically changes the vanilla look of the traditional plastic bezeled EC and prismatic interior mirrors. Infinity mirror provides a jewel-like appearance while improving forward visibility by 15 to 25 percent.
## Exterior Mirrors
Styling and Safety in One Package
Magna is a global leader providing high-tech exterior mirrors that not only improve safety, but improve the aesthetics of the vehicle. Exterior mirrors provide rearward vision while integrated electronics improve vehicle visibility and safety.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/vison-systems/2017_clearview_bmw-9-for-webjpg.jpg?sfvrsn=d5c664ee_0)
### ClearView™ Outside Mirror
The ClearView™ outside mirror integrates a camera into a traditional mirror which is regulatory compliant. Featuring a larger field of view, intuitive dynamic overlays, reduced drag and improved low light visibility, the systems displays a live feed from the camera on a screen integrated on the A-pillar.
Also available as a camera-wing only option, ClearView™ provides an abundance of features and styling possibilities.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/exterior-interior/mirrors/clearview)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/exfinity-mirror/website_exfinity_thumbnail-01.jpg?sfvrsn=80c1eef6_3)
### ExfinityMirror™
ExfinityMirror™ eliminates the frame of the mirror by adding a highly polished glass edge allowing for unique styling possibilities and improved forward visibility.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/exterior-interior/mirrors/exfinitymirror)
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/vison-systems/bmw-i8osmforweb.jpg?sfvrsn=1e9e6750_0)
### HiddenSignal™
First-to-market outside mirror that features a fully integrated turn signal laser cut into the mirror housing. This production method results in a turn signal that is nearly invisible when not in use.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/vison-systems/lincoln-mkc.jpg?sfvrsn=8e5b6f45_0)
### Projection Lighting
Enhance vehicle styling with a downward facing light that allows ground illumination, logo lighting or both. Projection lighting modules provide opportunities for customer branding and can be packaged either in the outside mirror or door handle.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/vison-systems/lincoln-continental-osm-blindzone-onfor-web.jpg?sfvrsn=c75c89d4_0)
### Blind Spot Detection
Electronic Blind Zone Indicators (BZI) and the PACE award-winning BlindZoneMirror™ enhance vehicle safety by providing increased awareness of the vehicle's blind spots.
## Actuators
Robust. Efficient. Quiet.
Magna is a global leader in actuator design and manufacturing. Our actuators that enable features such as automatic power folding mirrors, mirror memory functions and other vehicle features. Robust, efficient and quiet – our actuators provide best in class performance and support any vehicle requirement.
[Learn more](https://www.magna.com/products/exterior-interior/mirrors/actuators)
![Close-up of a round automotive actuator component used for vehicle functions](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/actuators/revised-images/mr5-01.jpg?sfvrsn=15e98056_11)
## Overhead Consoles
Enhancing the Driver Experience Through Feature Integration
Magna is a complete system supplier for overhead consoles that increase luxury, functionality and safety. Our focus is in the integration of technology and electronics to enhance style, safety and convenience within the vehicle.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/ohc-cabin-monitor-01.jpg?sfvrsn=2b2b6ab4_2)
### Advanced Overhead Consoles
Magna’s advanced overhead consoles are customizable to integrate sensors and displays that offer a variety of features such as Driver Monitoring that increase safety and enhance the driving experience.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/vison-systems/maserati-levante-roof-swtichgearforweb.jpg?sfvrsn=d7587851_0)
### Human Machine Interface - HMI
Magna offers a variety of HMI solutions ranging from tactile and capacitive buttons to more advanced systems including Haptic feedback.
![](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/mirrors/moc_lighting-01.jpg?sfvrsn=cb478d29_2)
### Lighting
Leveraging automotive lighting expertise, Magna offers a full suite of integrated lighting solutions for overhead consoles including dome, RGB, ambient lighting, map and logo lights.
## Related News
## Magna's ClearView™ Vision System Comes to Market
Magna’s advanced ClearView™ vision technology designed to make vehicles smarter and safer has made its production debut on the Ram 2500 and 3500 Heavy Duty trucks. The unique system, which bundles camera and mirror technology, has the potential to reduce blind-spot accidents and promote safety by enhancing visibility around the vehicle. ClearView™ also provides other benefits including making it easier to park and maneuver the vehicle.
[Read news release](https://www.magna.com/stories/news-press-release/2023/magna's-clearview-vision-system-comes-to-market-on-ram-trucks)
![ID.4compressed](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/stories/clearview/magna_clearview_digital_mirror-01.jpg?sfvrsn=27528221_1)

# Explore our Engineered Glass Solutions
## Magna is the market leader in value-add glass systems
* All in: With 100% market share of rear truck sliding windows, Magna is the trusted name in engineered glass solutions.
* A perfect fit: Our expertise in encapsulated glass can be seen in both our fixed and sliding windows. With our seamless bonding capabilities, we provide a smooth finish without cutlines or breaks.
* Style that shines: Our multiple trim options – from gloss, flat, or stainless steel – securely package the windows with style, to give the vehicle a distinct fit and finish.
## Automotive glass that's seamless, stylish and smart
Our suite of automotive glass products offers seamless system interfaces, stylish aesthetics, and smart design to the vehicle.
With an expansive glass encapsulation portfolio, we cover everything from rear sliding & static windows for trucks, liftgates opening glass windows, quarter windows, roof glass, rear fixed and moveable windows, and more.
![Engineered glass rear window opened](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/engineered_glass/eng_glass-01.jpg?sfvrsn=a37e01e7_3)
![Engineered glass rear window](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/engineered_glass/eng_glass-02.jpg?sfvrsn=2a268f08_3)
![Engineered glass on a vehicle](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/engineered_glass/eng_glass-03.jpg?sfvrsn=9421ad0b_3)
## PureView™
The PACE Award winning PureView™ is a first-to-market rear sliding window for the truck market that provides a streamlined appearance and improved craftmanship.
* Seamless, one-piece design.
* Smooth opening when viewed from outside.
* Powered rear sliding window available for all pick-up truck programs.
* Improved sealing eliminates water leakage.
![PureView rear sliding window in a red truck](https://www.magna.com/images/default-source/products/engineered_glass/eng_glass-04.jpg?sfvrsn=1cbb58af_3)

# Glass Processing
![Glass Processing banner image](https://www.gentex.com/images/banners/_resize/Glass_Processing_-_Top_Banner_resize_ca15187fc0f4935d468ab6b17d37e88f.jpg)
# Glass Streamlining
At Gentex, we understand glass on a sophisticated level. We process millions of square feet of glass each month and use proprietary processes to bend, cut, coat, and grind that glass to meet various design and quality specifications. In-house development of chemicals, thin films, and processing gives us a competitive advantage as we are able adjust to changes in our products instantaneously, removing potential external supplier limitations.
![ image](https://www.gentex.com/files/_resize/Glass_Processing_-_Glass_Streamlining_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)
![](https://www.gentex.com/images/uploads/_resize/Glass_Processing_-_Tall_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)
Our Growing Capabilities
Glass Processing is just one of our specialized capabilities. Everyday, we continue to expand our vast knowledge in Vision Systems, Chemistry, Software and Manufacturing. And it doesn''t end there.

# **Welcome**to Continental

## Continental in Facts and Figures
[
![](https://cdn.continental.com/fileadmin/_processed_/9/d/csm_continental_unternehmenszentrale__7__863c7b1505.jpg)
Spin-Off Automotive
Due to the increasingly dynamic markets in the automotive industry, the Continental Executive Board has decided, following a strategic review, to on spin off the Automotive group sector.
**Find out more
](https://www.continental.com/en/press/studies-publications/other-publications/spin-off-automotive/)
[
![](https://cdn.continental.com/fileadmin/_processed_/8/5/csm_olaf_schick_jpk_2025-1_d61a8fad13.jpg)
Continental Continues Solid Development and Further Improves Automotive Earnings
August 05, 2025Continental proved resilient in the second quarter of 2025, with earnings in the Automotive group sector improving significantly both year-on-year and compared with the successful start to 2025. The Tires group sector achieved a double-digit adjusted EBIT margin, underlining the stability of the business despite the strong headwinds from tariffs and exchange rates. In a weak industrial environment, ContiTech increased its adjusted EBIT margin compared with the first quarter of the year.
**Find out more
](https://www.continental.com/en/press/press-releases/results-first-half-2025/)

![](https://cdn.continental.com/fileadmin/_processed_/d/2/csm_gb2024_titelbild_815ba15564.jpg)

The 2024 annual report covers topics such as our corporate strategy and structure, research and development, as well as general economic conditions. Starting this year, the sustainability report is part of the annual report. # Articles of Incorporation
Please find a convenience translation of the[Articles of Incorporation -pdf (204KB)](https://cdn.continental.com/fileadmin/__imported/sites/corporate/_international/english/hubpages/60_20company/20_20corporate_20governance/40_20articles_20of_20incorporation/250521_articles_of_incorporation_continental_ag.pdf)(Status May 21, 2025). # Gentex Supplier Conference
![](https://www.gentex.com/files/4C9A7425.jpg)
Gentex honored 21 companies with Supplier Awards at its Supplier Conference on May 22. Along with recognizing 19 companies as Supplier of the Year, Gentex also awarded winners in diversity and sustainability categories.
During the conference, several members of the Gentex leadership team provided updates about the company’’s business strategy, sustainability programs, and quality expectations.
This is the fifth year Gentex has presented awards to suppliers for delivering outstanding performance in quality, cost competitiveness, delivery support, innovation, and dedication to Gentex.
Diversity & Sustainability Awards
Gentex is committed to diversity in all aspects of its business. The company is a leader in West Michigan in developing a diverse workforce and continuing to value sourcing business to diverse suppliers to expand our supply base.
**Outstanding Diversity Winner - Royal Technologies**
Royal Technologies was selected for the 2024 Diversity Award based on their diversity spend.
Gentex values sustainability and continues to minimize its impact on the environment, create and implement a robust sustainability program, and operate in a socially responsible manner.
**Outstanding Sustainability Winner - Silicon Labs**
Silicon Labs was selected for the 2024 Sustainability Award for exceptional performance in this area.
![Diversity & Sustainability Awards image](https://www.gentex.com/images/sets/_resize/19_Royal_Technologies_DEI_Stage_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)
![ image](https://www.gentex.com/images/sets/_resize/20_Silicon_Labs_Sustanability_Stage_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)

# Chemistry
![Chemistry banner image](https://www.gentex.com/images/banners/_resize/Chemistry_-_Top_Banner_resize_ca15187fc0f4935d468ab6b17d37e88f.jpg)
# Chemical Innovations
Gentex has over 1300 patents today and nearly a quarter of them are for chemistry alone. Our team of chemists research, test, and manufacturer in house, all the chemicals that enable our core technologies. Working closely with our chemists allows us to continuously innovate on a molecular level to support both current and future technologies unique to the industry.
![ image](https://www.gentex.com/files/_resize/Chemistry_-_Left_Photo_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)
![](https://www.gentex.com/images/uploads/_resize/Chemistry_-_Tall_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)
Our Growing Capabilities
Chemistry isjust one of our specialized capabilities. Everyday, we continue to expand our vast knowledge in Vision Systems, Glass Processing, Software and Manufacturing. And it doesn''t end there.
![](https://www.gentex.com/images/uploads/_resize/Chemistry_-_Torch_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)

# Manufacturing
![Manufacturing banner image](https://www.gentex.com/images/banners/_resize/Manufacturing_-_Top_Banner_resize_ca15187fc0f4935d468ab6b17d37e88f.jpg)
# Production Floor Innovation
Manufacturing innovation provides Gentex its true competitive advantage. Our industry-defining capabilities used to develop and manufacture high-quality products for the automotive, aerospace, and commercial fire protection industries requirea high-level manufacturing process that allows us to consistently meet or adapt to customer demand. By innovating on the production floor, we have created a unique, highly automated manufacturing environment that yields quality products.
![ image](https://www.gentex.com/files/_resize/Manufacturing_-_Production_Floor_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)
![](https://www.gentex.com/images/uploads/_resize/Manufacturing_-_Tall_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)
Our Growing Capabilities
Manufacturing isjust one of our specialized capabilities. Everyday, we continue to expand our vast knowledge in Vision Systems, Glass Processing, Chemistry, and Software. And it doesn''t end there.
![](https://www.gentex.com/images/uploads/_resize/Manufacturing_-_Wide_Floor_resize_fe2c191087de40fab2d4fe7a68a1b95e.jpg)

# Mobility Study 2020
Since 2011, Continental as a technology company has periodically conducted mobility studies that focus on a variety of topics. The Mobility Study 2020, the sixth edition of the Continental Mobility Study, surveys attitudes toward various aspects of mobility in Germany, France, the USA, China and Japan. One of the core topics of the current study is automated and autonomous driving.The 2020 survey was carried out in two waves, each with a different focus.
In the second wave in October 2020, a population-representative sample of over 1,000 respondents was surveyed in five countries on three continents: Germany, France, the USA, Japan and China.The focus of this survey was on attitudes toward**automated and autonomous driving**: What role does driving play for the respondents? How willing are they to relinquish control and what significance do technological developments have for them? These questions are fundamental to acceptance of the technology. Openness to various**assistance systems**, also and especially to autonomous vehicles, was also queried.The key findings of the first wave of the Continental Mobility Study 2020 are summarized below.
## From Driver to Passenger: Attitudes Toward the Technological Development of the Car
![](https://cdn.continental.com/fileadmin/_processed_/0/a/csm_titelbild-broschuere-welle2_adas_ai_artificial_driver_647f3c8d6c.jpg)
For years, self-driving vehicles have held great promise for future mobility. The convenience of motorized personal transport that gives drivers the freedom to attend to other tasks during the ride, and last but not least, greater safety as drivers lose their significance as a potential source of error make the benefits seem obvious.
Partially autonomous driving is used increasingly today, and assistance systems for specific applications are produced as standard. However, it will be some time before highly automated driving, in which the driver hands over control to the software and no longer has to monitor it permanently, or fully automated and autonomous driving can be operated in regular traffic. The technology will continue to evolve, regulatory requirements will need to be put in place –and you will need people’s acceptance for a technology that hands over control of the vehicle.
Back in 2013, Continental’s mobility study focused on assistance systems and automated vehicles, while the fifth edition in 2018 also took a closer look at people’s attitudes toward the technology. This sixth mobility study is again shining a spotlight on this topic.

Press Release
### From Driver to Passenger: Automated Driving Is Gaining Acceptance Worldwide
Driver assistance systems and automated driving are gaining acceptance worldwide. In China and Japan in particular, openness to the benefits of automated driving is already high, while people in Germany, France and the USA continue to have a wait-and-see attitude. Overall, the technological possibilities in terms of automated driving are far more advanced than the current willingness of drivers to use them. The situation is different, however, for driver assistance systems –here there is a consistently high degree of openness in all five countries, especially when it comes to safety-related functions. These are the key findings of the latest Continental Mobility Study.
[Please find here the current press release](https://www.continental.com/en/press/press-releases/mobility-study-automated-driving/).
#### This could be interesting for you:
### Part 1 of the Mobility Study 2020 on the Topic of "(Electric) Mobility During the COVID-19 Pandemic"
![Mobility Study 2020](https://cdn.continental.com/fileadmin/_processed_/8/4/csm_mobistud2020_20key_20visual_20version_20f_c3_bcr_20mst_20_28en_29_60f9ab41a8.jpg)
The 2020 survey took place in two stages with different emphases.In addition to the expectations and attitudes regarding electric vehicles, the survey also dealt with changes in mobility against the backdrop of the global COVID-19 pandemic.
[Part1 of thestudy](https://www.continental.com/en/press/studies-publications/continental-mobility-studies/mobility-study-2020/)

# Industrial Solutions
Driven by technology and sustainability, the Industrial Solutions division is undergoing seismic change. As a sustainable supplier to a wide range of industries, we are dedicated to developing material-driven solutions that address the challenges of the world. The shift towards a**circular economy**and sustainable practices, as well as the development of new and advanced materials such as nanomaterials, biomaterials, and smart materials, are challenging the status quo. Continental is at the forefront of the transition to**electric cars**and**hydrogen-powered commercial vehicles**, as well as the fundamental change our customers are undergoing in the agricultural industry.

## Creating Sustainable Transport Options
Together, we are working on solutions to manage the shift from fossil fuels to**green**[**hydrogen**](https://www.continental-industry.com/de/campaigns/hydrogen-solutions<span>). For example, we are developing materials for the hydrogen value chain, for connector components, and for fluid transport in fuel cell engines. For battery-powered electric vehicles, we are focusing on**battery cooling systems**and other[thermal management solutions](https://www.continental-industry.com/de/campaigns/thermal-management). In addition to the challenges of making farms smarter and more efficient, there is also a strong focus on**sustainability**. Through[sustainable materials](https://www.continental-industry.com/en/campaigns/future-of-conveying/agriculture-stories/paving-the-way-to-smart-farms)in agricultural solutions and intelligent material solutions, we contribute to more durable, sustainable machines, predictive maintenance and efficient harvesting and conveying facilities.
## Discover Attractive Career Opportunities in the Field Industrial Solutions
Whether materials developers, mixers, process developers, chemists, product developers, laboratory technicians, or textile engineers –Continental offers all roles and responsibilities related to the materials development of plastics, rubber, and polymers for its products. In this area, it is important to define tailor-made formulas in tandem with customers and develop them in such a way that they can then be produced to high quality standards. The prerequisites for this highly technical field lie in a broad knowledge of chemistry, process engineering, materials development, textile technology, or similar disciplines, combined with a clear understanding of the processes and challenges of an industrial setting.
